---
title: "File List"
output: pdf_document
---

### Source path:
```{r echo = FALSE, message=FALSE, comment=NA}

kable(path_print, format = "pandoc", padding = 8,col.names =c(""), caption = "Source folder path:")
```


### Folders containing the files with the extension of interest
```{r, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE, comment=NA}
for (i in dir_list){
    a <- list.files(path = i, pattern = "\\.shp$")
    if (length(a) > 0){
      path2_print <- as.data.frame(i,PATH_DEST)
      kable(path2_print, format = "pandoc", padding = 6,col.names =c(""), caption = "none")
      print(a)
    } 
  } 
```
